name: Galaxium//ONE
description:
Diamond Studios' first game is finally out!

Blast your way through 8 challenging waves in an effort to stop the evil Blurgs from taking over Galaxius. At the end, you'll find the pinnacle of Blurg tech: the Mothership. Destroy it and retake Galaxius... until we make a sequel. Sorry. 

SARCASTIC™ FEATURE LIST
  • Extremely hard gameplay that is only fun sometimes
  • 9 waves including a bossfight that no one has beaten yet
  • Easy to learn yet infuriatingly hard to master
  • Pulse mechanics are not intuitive
  • High score saves... but only in the tab :(
HOW TO PLAY

The only buttons that work are:

  • X - Shoot, can be held
  • Z- Pulse. Depletes all your Energy Cores. The more Energy Cores you have when you Pulse, the more damage it does.
  • Arrow keys - Move and dodge
